      • getCoefficients

        public int[][][] getCoefficients()
        The coefficients are organized as follows: coefficients[block][offset][i] where: block is the color channel (RED=0, GREEN=1, BLUE=2) offset is the index of the pixel i is the index of the coefficients (a0...a5)
